summary: This document is a bank's response to a grand jury subpoena from the Southern District of New York, listing numerous commercial checking accounts and certificates associated with Jeffrey Epstein and various entities. It details account holders, authorized signatories, and opening/closing dates, revealing a complex financial network of LLCs and foundations controlled by Epstein and his associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the subpoena; listed as account holder or authorized signatory for numerous commercial checking accounts and certificates across various entities.

persons.name: Darren K Indyke
persons.context: Frequently listed as an authorized signatory or account holder alongside Jeffrey Epstein for multiple corporate accounts, indicating a key financial role.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory on several commercial checking accounts for entities like LCP COMPANY LLC, ISLAND GROUNDS INC, and LSJE LLC.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan-Wiebracht
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory on accounts for IGO COMPANY LLC, LAFAYETTE CONTRACTORS LLC, and SOUTHERN TRUST COMPANY INC.

persons.name: Cecile R De-Jongh
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory on a FINANCIAL TRUST COMPANY INC commercial checking account for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Miles Alexander
persons.context: Listed as account holder for LCP COMPANY LLC and as an authorized signatory for ISLAND GROUNDS INC.

persons.name: Lance A Calloway
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory for ISLAND GROUNDS INC.

persons.name: Ghislaine N Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory on a LITTLE ST JAMES LLC commercial checking account, directly linking her to Epstein's property entity.

persons.name: Jeffrey A Schantz
persons.context: Listed as an authorized signatory for the J EPSTEIN VIRGIN ISLANDS FOUNDATION INC account.

persons.name: Noraida Castro
persons.context: Signed the certification letter from the bank's Records & Legal Requirements Department, attesting to the truth of the provided information.

Both listed as authorized signatories on the SOUTHERN TRUST COMPANY INC account.

events.title: Bank Response to Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: A bank submits detailed financial records in compliance with a grand jury subpoena from the Southern District of New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is a direct response to a federal grand jury subpoena, indicating an active financial investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's network as of March 2020.
It reveals an extensive web of over 20 corporate entities (LLCs, foundations, and companies) with commercial checking accounts, used to manage Epstein's finances.
Ghislaine Maxwell is explicitly listed as an authorized signatory on the LITTLE ST JAMES LLC account, providing a direct financial link to Epstein's private island.
Many accounts were opened in the early 2000s and remained active or were closed around 2012-2019, spanning the period of Epstein's criminal activity and investigations.
The structure shows a pattern of using multiple authorized signatories (Epstein, Indyke, Beller, Brennan-Wiebracht) across entities, suggesting a coordinated financial management system.
